p: Medicinal herbs are a rich source of various bioactive compounds, which have long been used in the treatment of many diseases, including cancer [ 32]. Recently, compounds isolated from medicinal herbs have been identified as potent radiotherapy enhancers, such as radiosensitizers [ 33]. In this context, we have been searching for novel potent radiotherapy enhancers against IR-induced cancer cell migration and invasion from C. asiatica.
